cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.IR. 

The paper focuses on improving multilingual sentence embeddings using semantic specialization and language discrimination. This falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP), which is typically classified under cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also uses machine learning techniques such as fine-tuning and adversarial training, which are commonly associated with sub-categories such as cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Additionally, the paper mentions using embeddings for tasks such as intent classification and cross-lingual retrieval, which could fall under sub-categories such as cs.CV (Computer Vision) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
